page.title: 13REASONS FOR LIVING LOCALLY
page.content: With most work being outside the villages,what brought the people here and how long ago? Using the small sample of the families of a class of children it is surprising that only 4 out of 26 have been here more than 19 years and 18 have been here less than 15 years.For the vast majority of households these are{dormitory villages.} The{wage earner's job}is the unsur- prising reason for most villagers moving into the area. But why especially{Thurgarton}and{ {Bleasby?}5 said they liked the village and 4 said they liked the house.6 liked the house and the village whilst 3 came for the house and the job (including the vicar!) 2 came to be near relatives whilst 1 came in to buy a pig farm and another to convert a barn into a house.
